title: Introducing: Rochelle Jordan
content:
Rochelle Jordan is a breath of fresh air to the cramped world of female R’n’B artists.

Her debut album R O J O is set to change modern R’n’B in a way that The Weeknd could only have dreamed of, with the sassy yet sincere clarity each track is crafted with. From humble beginnings recording Drake covers in the confines of her bedroom, to unleashing a behemoth of a debut album at the end of August; Rochelle Jordan has already traveled a long way in such a short space of time. New cut _Shot is a glowing, synth driven track, poignant and despairingly haunting. It’s wonderfully grounding yet heart-wrenching to hear Rochelle’s vivid story-telling; whilst at the same time forming a brilliant introduction for those who are still to hear Rochelle’s music.

Check out _Shot below, and head over to Rochelle’s bandcamp for free downloads of all her material to date.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
